title: How can I update the details in my GCrypto account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I close my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308971000217-How-can-I-close-my-GCrypto-account)
- [How can I update my account information in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308652046361-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I update the details in my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10333738279321-How-can-I-update-the-details-in-my-GCrypto-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You can update the **address and mobile number** registered in your GCash account that is linked to your GCrypto account.

To update the mobile number linked to your GCrypto account, make sure that your new number is [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) on GCash before proceeding.

Once your GCash profile is updated, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcrypto%3A%3Ai_want_to_change_my_mobile_number_in_gcrypto&ticket_form_id=360000706713) A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

Please wait for **24 hours** for your new details to reflect in your GCrypto account.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I update my account information in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308652046361-Change-your-GCrypto-account-information)

- [How can I receive crypto using GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10203149752601-Receive-Crypto-with-GCrypto)
